metadata.title: USN-5328-1 -- OpenSSL vulnerability
metadata.description: Tavis Ormandy discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly parsed certain certificates. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause OpenSSH to stop responding, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5328-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libssl1.1 - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.12 libssl-dev - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.12 openssl - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.12 libssl-doc - 1.1.1f-1ubuntu2.12 No subscription required
